anya-e0904n0:4_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0904n0:4_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte
anya-e0904n0:4_2: tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:5_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0904n0:5_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte
anya-e0904n0:5_2: tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ navahi ca suttasahassehi pañcahi ca suttasattehi
anya-e0904n0:5_3: sattapaññāsāya ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:6: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāyepi āvuso ekakanipāto dukanipāto tikanipātotiādinā nipātapakaraṇaparicchedavasena ekādasavidhā. Tattha kataraṃ nipātapakaraṇaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:7: Vissajjanā – aṅguttaranikāye bhante ekādasasu nipātapakaraṇaparicchedesu ekakanipātaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:9: Pucchā – ekakanipātepi āvuso rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggo akammaniyavaggotiādinā vaggabhedavasena bahuvidhā. Tattha kataraṃ vaggaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:10: Vissajjanā – ekakanipāte bhante rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggotiādinā vīsatiyā vaggesu rūpādivaggaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:11_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, mayampi dāni āvuso tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgāhanatthāya
anya-e0904n0:11_2: bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte rūpādivagge
anya-e0904n0:11_3: purimāni pañca suttāni kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:12_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ pañcannaṃ
anya-e0904n0:12_1: purisānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0904n0:12_2: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave itthirūpaṃ, itthirūpaṃ
anya-e0904n0:12_3: bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:13_0: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0904n0:13_1: tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave itthirūpaṃ, itthirūpaṃ bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ
anya-e0904n0:14: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pacchimāni pañca suttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:15_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:15_1: pañcannaṃ itthīnaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:15_2: yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave purisarūpaṃ, purisarūpaṃ
anya-e0904n0:15_3: bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:16_0: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0904n0:16_1: tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave purisarūpaṃ, purisarūpaṃ bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ
anya-e0904n0:18: Pucchā – imasmiṃ āvuso rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena kiṃ kathitaṃ, neyyatthavasena pana kiṃ ñāpitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:19: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. Neyyatthavasena pana vivaṭṭampi ñāpitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:21: Pucchā – dutiyo pana āvuso nīvaraṇappahānavaggo bhagavatā kattha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:22_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:22_1: yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0904n0:22_2: saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave subhanimittaṃ, subhanimittaṃ bhikkhave ayoniso manasikaroto
anya-e0904n0:22_3: anuppannoceva kāmacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0904n0:23: Pucchā – imasmiṃ pana āvuso dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā kiṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:24: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ pana bhante dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā vaṭṭampi vivaṭṭampi kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:26: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte tatiye akammaniyavagge kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:27_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye bhante akammaniyavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:27_1: yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ, cittaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:27_2: abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti. Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ
anya-e0904n0:27_3: evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ. Cittaṃ bhikkhave bhāvitaṃ
anya-e0904n0:27_4: kammaniyaṃ hotī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:29: Pucchā – catutthe panāvuso adantavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:30_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante adantavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:30_1: yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ, cittaṃ
anya-e0904n0:30_2: bhikkhave adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati. Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi
anya-e0904n0:30_3: samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:30_4: cittaṃ bhikkhave dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:32: Pucchā – pañcame āvuso paṇihitaacchavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:33_0: Vissajjanā – pañcame bhante paṇihitaacchavagge “seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisūkaṃ vā
anya-e0904n0:33_1: yavasūkaṃ vā micchāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati,
anya-e0904n0:33_2: lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhāna vijjati. Taṃ kissahetu, micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:33_3: sūkassa. Evameva kho bhikkhave so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati,
anya-e0904n0:33_4: vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, taṃ kissa hetu,
anya-e0904n0:33_5: micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave cittassā”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:35: Pucchā – accharāsaṅghātavagge āvuso paṭhama dutiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:36_0: Vissajjanā – accharāsaṅghātavagge bhante bhagavatā “pabhassaramidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:36_1: tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ, taṃ assutavā puthujjano yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0904n0:36_2: nappajānāti, tasmā ‘assutavato puthujjanassa cittabhāvanā natthī’ti vadāmi. Pabhassaramidaṃ
anya-e0904n0:36_3: bhikkhave cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ, taṃ subhavā ariyasāvako
anya-e0904n0:36_4: yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Tasmā ‘sutapato ariyasāvakassa cittabhāvanā atthī’ti vadāmī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:38: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:39_1: ce bhikkhave bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevati, bhāveti, manasikaroti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:39_2: bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0904n0:39_3: bhuñjati, ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkaronti. Yekeci bhikkhave dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā
anya-e0904n0:39_4: akusalapakkhikā, sabbete manopubbaṅgamā, mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0904n0:39_5: anvadeva akusalādhammā, yekeci bhikkhave dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā,
anya-e0904n0:39_6: sabbete manopubbaṅgamā, mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva kusalā
anya-e0904n0:39_7: dhammā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:41: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:42_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge
anya-e0904n0:42_1: dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge paṭhamasuttañca “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi
anya-e0904n0:42_2: samanupassāmi, yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā vā kusalā dhammā
anya-e0904n0:42_3: parihāyanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave pamādo, pamattassa bhikkhave anuppannā ceva akusalā
anya-e0904n0:42_4: dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:44: Pucchā – kalyāṇamittādivagge āvuso dutiya tatiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:45_0: Vissajjanā – kalyāṇamittādivagge bhante dutiya tatiyasuttāni “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ
anya-e0904n0:45_1: ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
anya-e0904n0:45_2: vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave anuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ananuyogo
anya-e0904n0:47: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:48_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca “appamattikā
anya-e0904n0:48_1: esā bhikkhave parihāni yadidaṃ ñātiparihāni. Etaṃ patikiṭṭhaṃ bhikkhave parihānīnaṃ
anya-e0904n0:48_2: yadidaṃ paññāparihānīti. Appamattikā esā bhikkhave vuddhi yadidaṃ ñātivuddhi. Etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n0:48_3: bhikkhave vuddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ paññāvuddhi. Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘paññāvuddhiyā
anya-e0904n0:48_4: vaddhissāmā’ti. Evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:50: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena pamādādivagge dutiyasuttādīni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:51_0: Vissajjanā – nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya
anya-e0904n0:51_1: saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave pamādo. Pamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n0:51_2: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi, yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ
anya-e0904n0:51_3: bhikkhave appamādo, appamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n0:53: Pucchā – dutiye panāvuso pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:54_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye bhante pamādādivagge ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ
anya-e0904n0:54_1: ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:54_2: pamādo. Pamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattati. Ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti
anya-e0904n0:54_3: karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ
anya-e0904n0:54_4: bhikkhave appamādo. Appamādo bhikkhave mahato atthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n0:56: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tettiṃsamādīnica dasasuttāni adhammavagge ca dasasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:57_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tettiṃsamādīni dasasuttāni ca adhammavagge dasasuttāni
anya-e0904n0:57_1: ca ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “dhammo”ti dīpenti, te bhikkhave bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya
anya-e0904n0:57_2: paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:57_3: Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentīti
anya-e0904n0:57_4: evamādinā ca, ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “adhammo”ti dīpenti, te bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:57_5: bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya bahujano janassa atthāya hitāya
anya-e0904n0:57_6: sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ
anya-e0904n0:57_7: ṭhapentīti evamādinā ca bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:59: Pucchā – ekapuggalavagge āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:60_0: Vissajjanā – ekapuggalavagge bhante bhagavatā ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno
anya-e0904n0:60_1: uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:60_2: Katamo ekapuggalo, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekapuggalo
anya-e0904n0:60_3: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya
anya-e0904n0:60_4: sukhāya devamanussānanti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:63: Pucchā – etadavagge āvuso āgatesu ekacattālīsāya theresu āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:64_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:64_1: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti, evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n0:66_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge
anya-e0904n0:66_1: āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā ca sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati paṭhamo
anya-e0904n0:66_2: aggasāvako āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānatthero dutiyo aggasāvako kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:67_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n0:67_1: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti. Āyasmā pana mahāmoggallānatthero
anya-e0904n0:67_2: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti.
anya-e0904n0:67_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:68: Idaṃ te āsanaṃ vīra, paññattaṃ tavanucchaviṃ;
anya-e0904n0:70: Ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhu aññataro.
anya-e0904n0:71: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:76: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:77: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto.
anya-e0904n0:78: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno.
anya-e0904n0:80: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle pāmokkhasaṅghanāyakabhūto bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:81_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle saṅghapāmokkhabhūto
anya-e0904n0:81_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti.
anya-e0904n0:81_2: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:83: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā anuruddhatthero kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:84: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante anuruddhatthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:86: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso sīvalitthero bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:87: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante sīvalitthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvalī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:88: Sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0904n0:89: Suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
anya-e0904n0:90: Susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ, yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjati –
anya-e0904n0:91: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvali” hu –
anya-e0904n0:93: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle dhammavissajjakatherabhūto kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:94_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle
anya-e0904n0:94_1: dhammavissajjakabhūto “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:94_2: yadidaṃ ānando. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satimantānaṃ yadidaṃ
anya-e0904n0:94_3: ānando. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n0:94_4: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhitimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando. Etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n0:94_5: bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n0:99: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ. Satimantānaṃ. Gatimantānaṃ. Dhitimantānaṃ. Upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando” –
anya-e0904n0:101_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge
anya-e0904n0:101_1: āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto
anya-e0904n0:102_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto
anya-e0904n0:102_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0904n0:108: Pucchā – etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpati gotamītherī kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:109_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpatigotamītherī
anya-e0904n0:109_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpati
anya-e0904n0:109_2: gotamī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:110: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamī” –
anya-e0904n0:111: Pucchā – khemātherī pana āvuso aggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:112: Vissajjanā – khemātherī bhante paṭhamā aggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:117: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā” –
anya-e0904n0:118: Pucchā – uppalavaṇṇā pana āvuso therī dutiyaaggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:119_0: Vissajjanā – uppalavaṇṇā bhante therī dutiyaaggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n0:119_1: sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n0:120: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā” –
anya-e0904n0:122: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu terasasu therīsu paṭācārānāma therī kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:123_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therikāsu paṭācārā therī “etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n0:123_1: bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā”ti evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n0:142: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā” –
anya-e0904n0:144: Pucchā – dhammadinnā pana āvuso therī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:145: Vissajjanā – dhammadinnā bhante therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:150: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā” –
anya-e0904n0:152: Pucchā – bhaddakaccānānāma āvuso yasodharātherī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:153_0: Vissajjanā – bhaddakaccānā bhante yasodharātherī bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n0:153_1: sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n0:154: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā” –
anya-e0904n0:156: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu tapussabhallikānāma vāṇijā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:157_0: Vissajjanā – tapussabhallikā bhante vāṇijā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:157_1: paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā”ti, evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n0:158: “Ete bhante mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate” hu –
anya-e0904n0:159: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā” –
anya-e0904n0:161_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā arahatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte
anya-e0904n0:161_1: etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:162_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko
anya-e0904n0:162_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati
anya-e0904n0:162_2: anāthapiṇḍiko”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:163: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko–
anya-e0904n0:165: Pucchā – sūrambaṭṭho nāma āvuso upāsako bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:166: Vissajjanā – sūrambaṭṭho upāsako “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n0:167: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho” hu –
anya-e0904n0:169: Pucchā – etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu sujātānāma upāsikā seniyadhītā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:170_0: Vissajjanā – sujātā bhante seniyadhītā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:170_1: paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n0:171: “Etā mayaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca, upāsikāyo no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetā saraṇaṃ gatā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:172: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā” –
anya-e0904n0:174: Pucchā – visākhā pana āvuso upāsikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:175_0: Vissajjanā – visākhā bhante upāsikā migāramātā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:175_1: upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:176: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:178: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarānāma upāsikā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:179_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarā upāsikā “etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n0:179_1: bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā”ti evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n0:180: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā” hu –
anya-e0904n0:182: Pucchā – kāḷīnāma āvuso upāsikā kuraragharikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n0:183_0: Vissajjanā – kāḷī bhante upāsikā kuraragharikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:183_1: anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n0:184: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā” –
anya-e0904n0:186: Pucchā – sakalāpi āvuso aṭṭhānapāḷi bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:187_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañcisaṅkhāraṃ
anya-e0904n0:187_1: niccato upagaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ bhikkhave vijjati,
anya-e0904n0:187_2: yaṃ puthujjano kañcisaṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya, ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:189: Pucchā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ āvuso paṭhamavagge kīdisī dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n0:190_0: Vissajjanā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ bhante paṭhamavagge “ekadhammo bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato
anya-e0904n0:190_1: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n0:190_2: Katamo ekadhammo, buddhānussati, ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato
anya-e0904n0:190_3: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti
anya-e0904n0:191: Pucchā – dutiyavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:192_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyavagge bhante bhagavatā “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n0:192_1: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā vā akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0904n0:192_2: vepullāya saṃvattanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhikassa bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:192_3: anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0904n0:192_4: vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti. Evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:194: Pucchā – tatiyavagge pana āvuso pañcamādīni aṭṭha suttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:195_0: Vissajjanā – tatiyavagge bhante pañcamādīni aṭṭhasuttāni “durakkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye
anya-e0904n0:195_1: yo ca samādapeti, yañca samādapeti, yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati. Sabbete
anya-e0904n0:195_2: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavanti. Taṃkissahetu, durakkhābhattā bhikkhave dhammassa. Svākkhāte
anya-e0904n0:195_3: bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti, yañca samādapeti, yo ca samādapito, tathattāya
anya-e0904n0:195_4: paṭipajjati, sabbete bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti. Taṃkissahetu svākkhātattā bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:197: Pucchā – aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:198_1: bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati
anya-e0904n0:198_2: satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, ko pana vādo ye naṃ
anya-e0904n0:198_3: bahulīkarontī”ti evamādikā bhante bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:200: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso kāyagatāsativaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:201_0: Vissajjanā – yassa kassaci bhikkhave mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo, antogadhā tassa kunnadiyo
anya-e0904n0:201_1: yākāci samuddaṅgamā, evameva bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā,
anya-e0904n0:201_2: antogadhā tassa kusalā dhammā yekeci vijjābhāgiyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi
anya-e0904n0:203: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso amatavaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsato.
anya-e0904n0:204_0: Vissajjanā – amataṃ te bhikkhave na paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0904n0:204_1: Amataṃ te bhikkhave paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjanti. Amataṃ te bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:204_2: aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā. Amataṃ te bhikkhave paribhuttaṃ, yesaṃ
anya-e0904n0:204_3: kāyagatāsati paribhuttāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi amatavaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n0:206: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte kammakaraṇavagge paṭhamaṃ vajjasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:207: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave vajjāni. Katamāni dve diṭṭhadhammikañca vajjaṃ samparāyikañca vajja”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:208_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikassa vajjassa bhāyissāma, samparāyikassa
anya-e0904n0:208_1: vajjassa bhāyissāma, vajjabhīruno bhavissāma vajjabhayadassāvino”ti. Evañhi kho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:210: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ padhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:211_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave padhānāni
anya-e0904n0:211_1: durabhisambhavāni lokasmiṃ. Katamāni dve, yañca gihīnaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasataṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānuppādanatthaṃ
anya-e0904n0:211_2: padhānaṃ, yañca agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:211_3: Imāni kho bhikkhave dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:213: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:214_0: Vissajjanā – dveme bhikkhave dhammā tapanīyā. Katame dve, idha bhikkhave ekaccassa
anya-e0904n0:214_1: kāyaduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti kāya sucaritaṃ, vacīduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n0:214_2: akataṃ hoti vacīsucaritaṃ, manoduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti manosucaritaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:214_3: So “kāyaduccaritaṃ me kata”nti tappati, “akataṃ me kāyasucarita”nti tappati. Vacīduccaritaṃ
anya-e0904n0:214_4: (pa) “manoduccaritaṃ me kata”nti tappati, “akataṃ me manosucarita”nti tappati. Ime
anya-e0904n0:214_5: kho bhikkhave dve dhammā tapanīyāti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:216: Pucchā – catutthaṃ pana āvuso atapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:217_0: Vissajjanā – catutthaṃ bhante atapanīyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā atapanīyā.
anya-e0904n0:217_1: Katame dve, idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyasucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti kāyaduccaritaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:217_2: Vacīsucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti vacīduccaritaṃ. Manosucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ
anya-e0904n0:217_3: hoti manoduccaritaṃ. So ‘kāyasucaritaṃ me kata’nti na tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti
anya-e0904n0:217_4: natappati. ‘Vacīsucaritaṃ…pe… manosucaritaṃ me kata’nti na tappati. ‘Akataṃ me manoduccarita’nti
anya-e0904n0:217_5: na tappati. Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:219: Pucchā – pañcamaṃ pana āvuso upaññātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:220_0: Vissajjanā – pañcamaṃ bhante upaññātasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ upaññāsiṃ.
anya-e0904n0:220_1: Yā ca asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesu, yā ca appaṭivānitā padhānasmiṃ. Appaṭivāni
anya-e0904n0:220_2: sudāhaṃ bhikkhave padahāmi ‘kāmaṃ-taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu upasussatu
anya-e0904n0:220_3: sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:220_4: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:222: Pucchā – navamaṃ pana āvuso cariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:223_0: Vissajjanā – navamaṃ bhante cariyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā sukkā lokaṃ pālenti.
anya-e0904n0:223_1: Katame dve, hirīca ottappañca. Ime kho bhikkhave dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
anya-e0904n0:225: Pucchā – adhikaraṇavagge pana āvuso sattamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:226_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0904n0:226_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0904n0:226_2: midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:226_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa
anya-e0904n0:226_4: bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:227: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n0:228: “Katattāca brāhmaṇa akatattāca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti” –
anya-e0904n0:229: Ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti –
anya-e0904n0:230: Katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n0:231: Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ –
anya-e0904n0:232: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu.
anya-e0904n0:234: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:235: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmato ānandassa “ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda akaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṃ manoduccarita”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:236: “Ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda karaṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyasucaritaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ manosucaritaṃ” –
anya-e0904n0:238: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte adhikaraṇavagge navamasuttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:239_0: Vissajjanā – akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahatha, sakkā bhikkhave akusalaṃ pajahituṃ. Nocedaṃ
anya-e0904n0:239_1: bhikkhave sakkā abhavissa akusalaṃ pajahituṃ, nāhaṃ evaṃ vadeyyaṃ “akusalaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:239_2: pajahathā”ti. Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave sakkā akusalaṃ pajahituṃ, tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi
anya-e0904n0:239_3: “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti. Akusalañca hidaṃ bhikkhave pahīnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya
anya-e0904n0:239_4: saṃvatteyya, nāhaṃ evaṃvadeyyaṃ “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti. Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:239_5: akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi “akusalaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:241: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaekādasamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:242_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaekādasamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa
anya-e0904n0:242_1: sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame dve, dunnikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho
anya-e0904n0:242_2: ca dunnīto, dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti. Ime kho
anya-e0904n0:242_3: bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca. “Dveme
anya-e0904n0:242_4: bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame
anya-e0904n0:242_5: dve, sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho ca sunīto, sunikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa
anya-e0904n0:242_6: atthopi sunayo hoti. Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya
anya-e0904n0:242_7: anantaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:245: Pucchā – bālavagge pana āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:246_0: Vissajjanā – bālavagge bhante dutiyaṃ suttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:246_1: Katame dve, duṭṭho vā dosantaro saddho vā duggahitena. Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ
anya-e0904n0:246_2: abbhācikkhantī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:248: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:249_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:249_1: Katame dve, yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti
anya-e0904n0:249_2: dīpeti. Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti’ dīpeti.
anya-e0904n0:249_3: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti. Dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:249_4: Katame dve, yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti
anya-e0904n0:249_5: dīpeti. Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n0:249_6: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:251: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthapañcamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:252_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthapañcamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n0:252_1: Katame dve, yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ ‘nītattho suttanto’ti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ
anya-e0904n0:252_2: suttantaṃ ‘neyyattho suttanto’ti dīpetī”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:254: Pucchā – samacittavagge āvuso paṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:255_0: Vissajjanā – samacittavagge bhante paṭhamasuttaṃ “asappurisabhūmiñca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:255_1: desessāmi sappurisabhūmiñca, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti, evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:257: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:258: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dutiyasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave na suppatikāra vadāmi. Katamesaṃ dvinnaṃ, mātu ca pitu cā”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:260: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ samacittasuttaṃ kattha kassa kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:261: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ajjhattasaṃyojanañca āvuso puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca, taṃsuṇātha
anya-e0904n0:262: Sādhukaṃ manasikarothā”ti, evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:264: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso tattha bhagavā ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0904n0:265: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante bhagavā “tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā’ti. Evañhi vo sāriputta sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0904n0:266: “Eso bhante āyasmā sāriputto pubbārāme migāramātupāsā de bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ deseti bahiddhā saṃyojanañca” –
anya-e0904n0:267: Sādhu bhante bhagavā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0904n0:268_0: Tā kho pana sāriputta devatā dasapi hutvā vīsampi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi
anya-e0904n0:268_1: hutvā paññāsampi hutvā saṭṭhipi hutvā āraggakoṭinitudanamattepi tiṭṭhanti, na ca
anya-e0904n0:269: Tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā.
anya-e0904n0:272: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte parisavagge paṭhamaṃ uttānasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:273_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante uttānasuttaṃ “dvemā sikkhave parisā, katamā dve, uttānā
anya-e0904n0:273_1: ca parisā gambhīrā ca parisā, katamā ca bhikkhave uttānā parisā, idha bhikkhave yassaṃ
anya-e0904n0:273_2: parisāyaṃ bhikkhū uddhatā honti unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā
anya-e0904n0:273_3: asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave uttānā parisā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:275: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ yadidaṃ gambhīrā parisā.
anya-e0904n0:277: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:278_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā. Katamā
anya-e0904n0:278_1: dve, anaggavatī ca parisā aggavatī ca parisā. Katamā ca bhikkhave anaggavatī parisā,
anya-e0904n0:278_2: idha bhikkhave yassaṃ parisāyaṃ therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā, okkamane
anya-e0904n0:278_3: pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā, na vīriyaṃ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa
anya-e0904n0:278_4: adhigamāya asacchikabhassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:280: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:281_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā.
anya-e0904n0:281_1: Katamā dve, okkācitavinītā parisā no paṭipucchāvinītā, paṭipucchā vinītā parisā no
anya-e0904n0:284: Pucchā – puggalavagge āvuso ekādasamaṃ asantasannivāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:285_1: vo bhikkhave desessāmi santasannivāsañca, taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasikarotha bhāsissāmī”ti
anya-e0904n0:287: Pucchā – sukhavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:288_0: Vissajjanā – sukhavagge bhante bhagavatā “dvemāni bhikkhave sukhāni. Katamāni dve,
anya-e0904n0:288_1: gihisukhañca pabbajitasukhañca, imāni kho bhikkhave dve sukhāni. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:288_2: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sukhānaṃ yadidaṃ pabbajitasukha”nti evamādikā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n0:290: Pucchā – āyācanavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n0:291_0: Vissajjanā – āyācanavagge bhante paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni “saddho bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0904n0:291_1: evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya tādiso homi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā”ti, evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:293: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:294_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi
anya-e0904n0:294_1: samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca
anya-e0904n0:294_2: hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:296: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte āyācanavagge chaṭṭhaṃ appasādanīyasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:297_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante appasādanīyasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:297_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n0:297_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi dvīhi, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā
anya-e0904n0:297_3: appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti, ananuvicca apariyo gāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne
anya-e0904n0:299: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:300_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchā paṭipajjamāno
anya-e0904n0:300_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hohi sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n0:300_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamesu dvīsu, mātari ca pitari cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:302: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:303_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchāpaṭipajjamāno
anya-e0904n0:303_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n0:303_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamesu dvīsu, tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake
anya-e0904n0:306: Pucchā – tikanipāte pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ bhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:307_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ “yāni kānici bhikkhave bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n0:307_1: sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato. Ye keci uppaddavā uppajjanti, sabbete
anya-e0904n0:307_2: bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato. Yekeci upasaggā uppajjanti, sabbete bālato uppajjanti
anya-e0904n0:309: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ cintīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:310_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante cintīsuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0904n0:310_1: bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni. Katamāni tīṇi, idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca
anya-e0904n0:310_2: hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:312: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:313_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:313_1: bālo veditabbo. Katamehi tīhi, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikaroti,
anya-e0904n0:313_2: parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:315: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:316_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:316_1: tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi, dussīlo ca hoti,
anya-e0904n0:316_2: dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti. Issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0904n0:316_3: Maccharī ca hoti, maccharamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:318: Pucchā – rathakāravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ ñātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:319_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante ñātasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ñāto
anya-e0904n0:319_1: bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujana dukkhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya
anya-e0904n0:319_2: ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ. Katamehi tīhi, ananulomike kāyakamme samādapeti,
anya-e0904n0:319_3: ananulomike vacīkamme samādapeti, ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:321: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:322: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo nirāso āsaṃso”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:324: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte rathakāravagge pañcamaṃ sacetanasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:325_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:325_1: rājā ahosi sacetano nāma, atha kho bhikkhave rājā sacetano rathakāraṃ āmantesi ito
anya-e0904n0:325_2: me samma rathakāra channaṃ māsānaṃ paccayena saṅgāmo bhavissati sakkhissasi me samma
anya-e0904n0:325_3: rathakāra navaṃ cakkayugaṃ kātu”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:327: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:328_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:328_1: bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
anya-e0904n0:328_2: Katamehi tīhi, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū
anya-e0904n0:328_3: hoti, jāgariyamanuyutto hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:330: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:331_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ “sace vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā
anya-e0904n0:331_1: paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ “devalokūpapattiyā āvuso samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:331_2: vussathā’ti. Nanu tumhe bhikkhave evaṃ puṭṭhā aṭṭīyeyyātha harāyeyyātha jiguccheyyāthā”ti
anya-e0904n0:333: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:334_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave aṅgehi
anya-e0904n0:334_1: samannāgato pāpaṇiko abhabbo anadhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ adhigantuṃ, adhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ
anya-e0904n0:334_2: phātiṃ kātuṃ. Katamehi tīhi, idha bhikkhave pāpaṇiko pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0904n0:337: Pucchā – puggalavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:338_0: Vissajjanā – puggalavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave gilānā santo
anya-e0904n0:338_1: saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, idha bhikkhave ekacco gilāno labhanto vā sappāyāni
anya-e0904n0:338_2: bhojanāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni, labhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhanto
anya-e0904n0:338_3: vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni, labhanto vā patirūpaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ alabhanto vā patirūpaṃ
anya-e0904n0:338_4: upaṭṭhākaṃ vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:340: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:341_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā
anya-e0904n0:341_1: puggalassa bahukārā. Katame tayo, yaṃ bhikkhave puggalaṃ āgamma puggalo buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
anya-e0904n0:341_2: gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti. Ayaṃ bhikkhave puggalo
anya-e0904n0:341_3: imassa puggalassa bahukāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:343: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge sattamaṃ jigucchitabbasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:344_0: Vissajjanā – sattamaṃ bhante jigucchitabbasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo
anya-e0904n0:344_1: saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo
anya-e0904n0:344_2: na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo
anya-e0904n0:344_3: na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti
anya-e0904n0:345: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā jigucchitabbo puggalo nasevitabbo nabhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:346_0: Vissajjanā – “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n0:346_1: na payirupāsitabbo. Idha bhikkhave ekacco dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro
anya-e0904n0:346_2: paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti
anya-e0904n0:346_3: avassuto kasambujāto, evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n0:346_4: na payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n0:347: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā ajjhupekkhitabbo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:348_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n0:348_1: na payirupāsitabbo, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo, appampi
anya-e0904n0:348_2: vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca
anya-e0904n0:348_3: pātukarotī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na
anya-e0904n0:349: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo puggalo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:350_0: Vissajjanā – “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo, idha
anya-e0904n0:350_1: bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo
anya-e0904n0:350_2: bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo puggalo
anya-e0904n0:352: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:353_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:353_1: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, gūthabhāṇī pupphabhāṇī madhubhāṇī”ti
anya-e0904n0:355: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gūthabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:356_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo gūthabhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n0:356_1: sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagatovā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagatovā
anya-e0904n0:356_2: abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho “ehambho purisa yaṃ jānāsi, taṃ vadehī”ti. So ajānaṃ vā āha
anya-e0904n0:356_3: “jānāmī”ti, jānaṃ vā āha “na jānāmī”ti, apassaṃ vā āha “passāmī”ti, passaṃ vā āha
anya-e0904n0:356_4: “na passāmī”ti. Iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā
anya-e0904n0:356_5: hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo gūthabhāṇīti, evaṃ kho bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0904n0:358: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā pupphabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:359_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo pupphabhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n0:359_1: sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagato
anya-e0904n0:359_2: vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho “ehambho purisa yaṃ pajānāsi, taṃ vadehī”ti. So ajānaṃ vā
anya-e0904n0:359_3: āha “na jānāmī”ti, jānaṃ vā āha “jānāmī”ti, apassaṃ vā āha “na passāmī”ti, passaṃ
anya-e0904n0:359_4: vā āha “passāmī”ti, iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā
anya-e0904n0:359_5: bhāsitā hoti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo pupphabhāṇīti, evaṃ kho bhante tattha
anya-e0904n0:361: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:362: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo madhubhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato
anya-e0904n0:363: Hotīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:365: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:366_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā
anya-e0904n0:366_1: santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:367: Pucchā – kīdiso āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:368: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu natthi, ediso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:369: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:370: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesuyeva paññācakkhu atthi na dhammesu. Īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:371: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:372: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu atthi, īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n0:374: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge dasamaṃ avakujjasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:375_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante avakujjasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:375_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, avakujjapañño puggalo ucchaṅgapañño puggalo puthupañño puggalo.
anya-e0904n0:375_2: Katamo ca bhikkhave avakujjapañño puggalo. Idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ārāmaṃ gantā
anya-e0904n0:375_3: hoti abhikkhaṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammassavanāya, tassa bhikkhū dhammaṃ desentiādikalyāṇaṃ
anya-e0904n0:375_4: majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
anya-e0904n0:375_5: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsenti. So tasmiṃ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0904n0:375_6: na majjhaṃ manasikaroti, na pariyosānaṃ manasikaroti, vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā
anya-e0904n0:375_7: kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti, na majjhaṃ manasikaroti, na pariyosānaṃ manasikarotī”ti
anya-e0904n0:377: Pucchā – devadūtavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:378_0: Vissajjanā – devadūtavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ “sabrahmakāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:378_1: tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Sapubbacariyakāni
anya-e0904n0:378_2: bhikkhave tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Āhuneyyāni
anya-e0904n0:378_3: bhikkhave tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Brahmāti
anya-e0904n0:378_4: bhikkhave mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pubbācariyāti bhikkhave mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ
anya-e0904n0:378_5: adhivacanaṃ. Āhuneyyāti bhikkhave etaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu, bahukārā
anya-e0904n0:378_6: bhikkhave mātāpitaro puttānaṃ āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro”ti, evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n0:381: Tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito;
anya-e0904n0:382: Annena atha pānena, vatthena sayanena ca;
anya-e0904n0:385: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatīti –
anya-e0904n0:386: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:387_0: Vissajjanā – pañcamaṃ bhante hatthakasuttaṃ āḷaviyaṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:387_1: Hatthako bhante āḷavako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kacci bhante bhagavā sukhamasayitthā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:387_2: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti,
anya-e0904n0:387_3: ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:389: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n0:390: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n0:400: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge chaṭṭhaṃ devadūtasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:401_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante devadūtasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave devadūtāni. Katamāni
anya-e0904n0:401_1: tīṇi, idha bhikkhave ekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā
anya-e0904n0:401_2: duccaritaṃ carati. So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā
anya-e0904n0:401_3: duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0904n0:401_4: Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā nānābāhāsu gahetvā yamassa rañño dassenti-ayaṃ deva
anya-e0904n0:401_5: puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asāmañño abrahmañño, na kule jeṭṭhapacāyī, imassa devo
anya-e0904n0:401_6: daṇḍaṃ paṇetū”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:402: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño paṭhamadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:403_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati
anya-e0904n0:403_1: samanubhāsati “ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti
anya-e0904n0:403_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño paṭhamadevadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:404: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n0:406: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:407_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n0:407_1: samanubhāsitvā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho
anya-e0904n0:407_2: purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n0:407_3: tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyā devadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:408: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiya devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n0:409: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthīṃ vā purisaṃ vā ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ sake muttakarīse palipannaṃ semānaṃ aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ aññehi saṃvesiyamānaṃ” –
anya-e0904n0:411: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño tatiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:412_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n0:412_1: samanubhāsitvā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho
anya-e0904n0:412_2: purisa natvaṃ manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtanti” evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0904n0:413: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n0:414: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ” –
anya-e0904n0:416: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa sattassa niraya dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:417_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave “yamo rājā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n0:417_1: samanubhāsitvā tuṇhī hoti. Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma
anya-e0904n0:417_2: kāraṇaṃ karonti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiyasmiṃ hatthe
anya-e0904n0:417_3: gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiyasmiṃ pāde gamenti,
anya-e0904n0:417_4: tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ majjheurasmiṃ gamenti. So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā
anya-e0904n0:417_5: vedayati, na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti, yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhotī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:417_6: bhante tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa nirayadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n0:419: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṃvejanīyakathā kathitā.
anya-e0904n0:420_0: Vissajjanā – bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave yamassa rañño etadahosi “ye kira bho loke pāpakāni
anya-e0904n0:420_1: kammāni karonti, te evarūpā vividhā kammakaraṇā karīyanti, ahovatāhaṃ manussattaṃ
anya-e0904n0:420_2: labheyyaṃ, tathāgato ca loke uppajjeyya arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n0:421: “Ye kira bho loke pāpakāni kammāni karonti”.
anya-e0904n0:424: Ye ca kho devadūtehi, santo sappurisā idha;
anya-e0904n0:431: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge aṭṭhamaṃ catumahārājasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:432_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhamaṃ bhante catumahārājasuttaṃ “aṭṭhamiyaṃ bhikkhave pakkhassa catunnaṃ
anya-e0904n0:432_1: mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicaranti kacci bahū manussā manussesu
anya-e0904n0:432_2: matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti,
anya-e0904n0:433: Appakā kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti, puññāni karonti.
anya-e0904n0:434: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā parihāyissanti, paripūrissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n0:435: Bahū kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti, puññāni karonti.
anya-e0904n0:436: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā paripūrissanti, parihāyissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n0:438: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:439_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave ādhipateyyāni.
anya-e0904n0:439_1: Katamāni tīṇi, attādhipateyyaṃ lokādhipateyyaṃ dhammādhipateyyaṃ. Katamañca bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:439_2: attādhipateyyaṃ, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato
anya-e0904n0:439_3: vā iti paṭisañcikkhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:441: Pucchā – brāhmaṇavagge āvuso catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:442_0: Vissajjanā – brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ aññataraṃ brāhmaṇa
anya-e0904n0:442_1: paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇaparibbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0904n0:442_2: “sanniṭṭhiko dhammo sandiṭṭhiko dhammoti bho gotama vuccati, kittāvatānu kho bho
anya-e0904n0:442_3: gotama sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo
anya-e0904n0:442_4: viññūhī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto
anya-e0904n0:442_5: attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhaya byābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi
anya-e0904n0:442_6: dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, rāge pahīne nevattabyābādhāyapi ceteti, naparabyābādhāyapi
anya-e0904n0:442_7: ceteti, naubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, nacetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
anya-e0904n0:444: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vacchagottasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:445_0: Vissajjanā – sattamaṃ bhante vacchagottasuttaṃ vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0904n0:445_1: bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho gotama
anya-e0904n0:445_2: samaṇo gotamo evamāha “mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ dānaṃ dātabba. (Peyyāla)
anya-e0904n0:445_3: anabbhakkhā tukāmāhi mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotama”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te
anya-e0904n0:445_4: vaccha evamāhaṃsu samaṇo gotamo evamāha mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ dātabba”nti
anya-e0904n0:447: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ saṅgāravasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:448_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante saṅgāravasuttaṃ saṅgāravaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:448_1: Saṅgāravo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mayamassu bho gotama brāhmaṇā nāma
anya-e0904n0:448_2: yaññaṃ yajāmapi yajāpemapi, tatra bho gotama yo ceva yajati yo ca yajāpeti, sabbe
anya-e0904n0:448_3: te anekasārīrikaṃ puññappaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā honti, yadidaṃ yaññādhikaraṇaṃ, yopanāyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:448_4: bho gotama yassa vā kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito ekamattānaṃ dameti, ekamattānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:448_5: sameti, ekamattānaṃ parinibbāpeti, evamassāyaṃ ekasārīrikaṃ puññappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno
anya-e0904n0:448_6: hoti, yadidaṃ pabbajjādhikaraṇa”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tenahi brāhmaṇa taññevettha
anya-e0904n0:448_7: paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:449: “Iccāyapi bho gotama evaṃ bhante anekasārīrikā puññappaṭipadā hoti” –
anya-e0904n0:450: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiya anusandhimhi bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanā desitā.
anya-e0904n0:451: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dutiye anusandhimhi tividhā pāṭihāriyā paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n0:452: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n0:453: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n0:455: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanimāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ venāgapurasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:456_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante venāgapure nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ gāme venāgapurikaṃ vacchagottaṃ
anya-e0904n0:456_1: brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Venāgapuriko bhante vacchagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:456_2: etadavoca “acchariyaṃ bho gotama, abbhutaṃ bho gotama, yāvañcidaṃ bhoto gotamassa
anya-e0904n0:456_3: vippasannāni indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto (peyyāla) evarūpānaṃ nūna
anya-e0904n0:456_4: bhavaṃ gotamo uccāsayana mahāsayanānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0904n0:456_5: vatthusmiṃ “yāni kho pana tāni brāhmaṇa uccāsayana mahāsayanāni. Seyyathidaṃ, āsandi
anya-e0904n0:456_6: pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī kaṭṭissaṃ
anya-e0904n0:456_7: koseyyaṃ kuṭṭakaṃ hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ ajinappaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ
anya-e0904n0:456_8: sauttaracchadaṃ ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ. Dullabhāni tāni pabbajitānaṃ, laddhā ca pana
anya-e0904n0:459: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:460_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:460_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi, so pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0904n0:460_2: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ
anya-e0904n0:462: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā brahmaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:463_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:463_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmīti evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:464: Katamaṃ pana taṃ bho gotama brahmauccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:466: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:467_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:467_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi. So pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0904n0:467_2: piṇḍapāta paṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:468: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso mahāvagge pañcamaṃ kesamuttisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:469_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante kesamuttenāma kālāmānaṃ nigame kesamuttiye kālāme ārabbha
anya-e0904n0:469_1: bhāsitaṃ. Kesamuttiyā bhante kālāmā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “santi bhante eke samaṇa
anya-e0904n0:469_2: brāhmaṇā kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti, te sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti, jotenti, parappavādaṃ
anya-e0904n0:469_3: pana khuṃsenti vambhenti paribhavanti, omakkhiṃ karonti, aparepi bhante eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0904n0:469_4: kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti, tepi sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti jotenti, parappavādaṃ pana khuṃsenti
anya-e0904n0:469_5: vambhenti paribhavanti, omakkhiṃ karonti. Tesaṃ no bhante amhākaṃ hoteva kaṅkhā,
anya-e0904n0:469_6: hoti vicikicchā ko su nāma imesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ āha, ko musā”ti.
anya-e0904n0:469_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alañhi vo kālāmā kaṅkhituṃ alaṃ vicikicchituṃ, kaṅkhīyeva
anya-e0904n0:469_8: pana vo ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:471: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte mahāvagge dasamaṃ uposathasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:472_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha “tayo kho me visākhe
anya-e0904n0:472_1: uposathā. Katame tayo. Gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:473: Handa kuto nu tvaṃ visākhe āgacchasi divā divassa.
anya-e0904n0:474: “Tayo kho me visākhe uposathā. Katame tayo, gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho” –
anya-e0904n0:476: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:477_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe gopālakuposatho hoti, seyyathāpi visākhe gopālako sāyanhasamaye
anya-e0904n0:477_1: sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati “ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca
anya-e0904n0:477_2: padese cariṃsu, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni piviṃsu.
anya-e0904n0:478: Sve dāni gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese carissanti, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni pivissantī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:480: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:481_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe nigaṇṭhuposatho hoti, atthi visākhe nigaṇṭhānāma samaṇajātikā,
anya-e0904n0:481_1: te sāvakaṃ evaṃ samādapenti, “ehitvaṃ ambhopurisa ye puratthimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ
anya-e0904n0:481_2: yojanasataṃ, tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhi, ye pacchimāya disāya. Ye uttarāya disāya. Ye
anya-e0904n0:481_3: dakkhiṇāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ, tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n0:483: Ehi tvaṃ ambho purisa sabbacelāni nikkhipitvā evaṃ vadehi.
anya-e0904n0:484: Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcana tatthi.
anya-e0904n0:486: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyuposatho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n0:487_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe ariyuposatho hoti, upakkiliṭṭhassa visākhe cittassa
anya-e0904n0:487_1: upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. Kathañca visākhe upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena
anya-e0904n0:487_2: pariyodapanā hoti. Idha visākhe ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati “itipi so bhagavā
anya-e0904n0:487_3: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
anya-e0904n0:487_4: satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti. Tassa tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati,
anya-e0904n0:487_5: pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyantīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0904n0:488: Pucchā – evaṃ upavutthassa pana āvuso ariyuposathassa kathaṃ mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0904n0:489_0: Vissajjanā – kīvamahapphalā hoti, kīvamahānisaṃso, kīvamahājutiko, kīvamahāvipphāro,
anya-e0904n0:489_1: seyyathāpi visākhe yo imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ mahājanapadānaṃ pahūtarattajanapadānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ
anya-e0904n0:489_2: rajjaṃ kāreyya, seyyathidaṃ “aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalānaṃ vajjīnaṃ mallānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:489_3: cetīnaṃ vaṅgānaṃ kurūnaṃ pañcālānaṃ macchānaṃ sūrasenānaṃ assakānaṃ avantīnaṃ gandhārānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:489_4: kambojānaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa uposathassa etaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:489_5: bhante tattha bhagavatā evaṃ upavutthassa ariyuposathassa mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā.
anya-e0904n0:492: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso tikanipāte ānandavagge dutiyaṃ ājīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:493_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ ājīvakasāvakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0904n0:493_1: ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante ājīvakasāvako gahapati
anya-e0904n0:493_2: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā,
anya-e0904n0:493_3: ke loke sukatā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gahapati taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n0:493_4: yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:494: “Kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā, ke loke sukatā”.
anya-e0904n0:497: “Abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya” –
anya-e0904n0:499: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ gandhajātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:500_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:500_1: etadavoca “tīṇimāni bhante gandhajātāni, yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati no paṭivātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0904n0:500_2: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati paṭivātampi
anya-e0904n0:500_3: gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0904n0:500_4: “atthānanda kiñci gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho
anya-e0904n0:500_5: gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:506: Pucchā – samaṇavagge āvuso dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:507_0: Vissajjanā – samaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gadrabho
anya-e0904n0:507_1: gogaṇaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ‘ahampi dammo ahampi dammo’ti, tassa na
anya-e0904n0:507_2: tādiso vaṇṇo hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, na tādiso saro hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, na tādisaṃ
anya-e0904n0:507_3: padaṃ hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, so gogaṇaṃyeva piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ahampi
anya-e0904n0:507_4: dammo ahampi dammo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:511: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso ekādasamaṃ saṅkavāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:512_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante saṅkavāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigame kassapagottaṃ nāma
anya-e0904n0:512_1: bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kassapa gotto bhante bhikkhu bhagavati manopadūsitvā bhagavato
anya-e0904n0:512_2: santike accayaṃ accayato desesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “thero cepi kassapa bhikkhu
anya-e0904n0:512_3: na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī. Ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā, te
anya-e0904n0:512_4: ca na sikkhāya samādapeti, ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati
anya-e0904n0:512_5: bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:515: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte loṇakapallavagge paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:516_0: Vissajjanā – loṇakapallavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:516_1: kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni. Katamāni tīṇi, idha bhikkhave kassako
anya-e0904n0:516_2: gahapati sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ
anya-e0904n0:516_3: sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni
anya-e0904n0:516_4: patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi. Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi
anya-e0904n0:516_5: kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:519: Pucchā – sambodhavagge panāvuso pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:520_0: Vissajjanā – sambodhavagge bhante pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ “ruṇṇamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa
anya-e0904n0:520_1: vinaye yadidaṃ gītaṃ, ummattakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ naccaṃ, komārakamidaṃ
anya-e0904n0:520_2: bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakahasitaṃ. Tasmātiha bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:520_3: setughāto gīte setughāto nacce, alaṃ vo dhammappamoditānaṃ sataṃ sitaṃ sitamattāyā”ti
anya-e0904n0:522: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ arakkhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:523_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anātapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “citte gahapati arakkhite
anya-e0904n0:523_1: kāyakammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi. Manokammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti. Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa
anya-e0904n0:523_2: arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi
anya-e0904n0:523_3: avassutaṃ hoti, manokammampi avassutaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:526: Pucchā – āpāyikavagge āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:527_0: Vissajjanā – āpāyikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vipattiyo.
anya-e0904n0:527_1: Katamā tisso sīlavipatti, cittavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti. Katamā ca bhikkhave sīlavipatti,
anya-e0904n0:527_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… samphappalāpī hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:530: Pucchā – kusināravagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ kusinārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:531_0: Vissajjanā – kusinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “idha
anya-e0904n0:531_1: bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, tamenaṃ gahapati
anya-e0904n0:531_2: vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimantetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:533: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:534_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante hatthakena devaputtena saddhiṃ “ye te hatthaka dhammā
anya-e0904n0:534_1: pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ, apinu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:536: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ anuruddhasuttaṃ kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:537_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhamaṃ bhante anuruddhasuttaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha
anya-e0904n0:537_1: āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “yaṃ kho te āvuso anuruddhaṃ evaṃ hoti
anya-e0904n0:537_2: ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokaṃ volokemī’ti,
anya-e0904n0:538: “Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatu” –
anya-e0904n0:541: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte kusināravagge navamaṃ paṭicchannasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:542_0: Vissajjanā – navamaṃ bhante paṭicchannasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṭicchannāni āvahanti
anya-e0904n0:542_1: no vivaṭāni. Katamāni tīṇi, mātugāmo bhikkhave paṭicchanno āvahati no vivaṭo, brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:542_2: bhikkhave mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti no vivaṭā, micchādiṭṭhi bhikkhave paṭicchannā
anya-e0904n0:542_3: āvahati no vivaṭā. Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭānī”ti
anya-e0904n0:544: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ lekhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:545_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante lekhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:545_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo pathavilekhūpamo puggalo udakalekhūpamo
anya-e0904n0:545_2: puggalo. Katamo ca bhikkhave pāsāṇa lekhūpamo puggalo, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n0:545_3: abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati, so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:545_4: pāsāṇalekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti, evameva kho
anya-e0904n0:545_5: bhikkhave idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati, so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n0:545_6: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:548: Pucchā – yodhājīvavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:549_0: Vissajjanā – yodhājīvavagge bhante pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:549_1: yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati. Kesakambalo
anya-e0904n0:549_2: bhikkhave sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso. Evameva kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:549_3: yānikānici puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇavādānaṃ, makkhalivādo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyatīti
anya-e0904n0:552: Pucchā – maṅgalavagge panāvuso navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:553_0: Vissajjanā – maṅgalavagge bhante navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā.
anya-e0904n0:553_1: Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”ti, evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n0:554: “Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā. Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”.
anya-e0904n0:556: Pucchā – tattho āvuso dasamaṃ pubbaṇhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:557_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante pubbaṇhasuttaṃ “ye bhikkhave sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena
anya-e0904n0:557_1: sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti. Supubbaṇho
anya-e0904n0:557_2: bhikkhave tesaṃ sattānaṃ. Ye bhikkhave sattā majjhanhikasamayaṃ…pe… sāyanhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:557_3: kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti. Susāyanho
anya-e0904n0:557_4: bhikkhave tesaṃ sattāna”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:562: Pucchā – catukkanipāte pana āvuso bhaṇḍagāmavagge paṭhamaṃ anubuddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā sattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:563_0: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante bhaṇḍagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “catunnaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:563_1: dhammānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva
