anya-e0904n0:563_2: tumhākañca. Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ, ariyassa bhikkhave sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n0:563_3: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca. Ariyassa bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:563_4: samādhissa…. Ariyāya bhikkhave paññāya…. Ariyāya bhikkhave vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n0:563_5: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0904n0:565: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:566_0: Vi – tattha bhante chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:566_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno,
anya-e0904n0:566_2: bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:569: Pu – caravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:570_0: Vi – caravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ “carato cepi bhikkhave bhikkhuno uppajjati
anya-e0904n0:570_1: kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvibhatto vā, taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati
anya-e0904n0:570_2: na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gametī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:573: Pu – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte uruvelavagge tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:574_0: Vi – uruvelavagge bhante tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ “loko bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho,
anya-e0904n0:574_1: lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto, lokasamudayo bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo
anya-e0904n0:574_2: tathāgatassa pahīno, lokanirodho bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho lokanirodho
anya-e0904n0:574_3: tathāgatassa sacchikato, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddhā,
anya-e0904n0:574_4: lokanirodhagāmini paṭipadā tathāgatassa bhāvitā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:608: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ brahmacariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:609_0: Vi – pañcamaṃ bhante brahmacariyasuttaṃ “nayidaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati
anya-e0904n0:609_1: janakuhanatthaṃ, na janalapanatthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsuttaṃ, na itivādappamokkhānisaṃsatthaṃ,
anya-e0904n0:609_2: na ‘iti maṃ jano jānātū’ti. Atha kho idaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati saṃvaratthaṃ
anya-e0904n0:609_3: pahānatthaṃ virāgatthaṃ nirodhattha”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:611: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:612_0: Vi – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave ariyavaṃsā aggaññā
anya-e0904n0:612_1: rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā, asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbāna saṃkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā
anya-e0904n0:612_2: samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi. Katame cattāro, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti
anya-e0904n0:612_3: itarītarena cīvarena, itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, na ca cīvarahetu anesanaṃ
anya-e0904n0:612_4: appatirūpaṃ āpajjati, aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati, laddhā ca cīvaraṃ agadhito
anya-e0904n0:612_5: amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati, tāya ca pana itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā
anya-e0904n0:612_6: nevattānukkaṃseti no paraṃ vambheti. Yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajāno paṭissabho,
anya-e0904n0:612_7: ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhito”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:615: Pu – cakkavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:616_0: Vi – cakkavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni, yehi
anya-e0904n0:616_1: samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattati, yehi samannāgatā devamanussā nacirasseva
anya-e0904n0:616_2: mahantattaṃ vepullattaṃ pāpuṇanti bhogesu. Katamāni cattāri, patirūpadesavāso sappurisāvassayo
anya-e0904n0:616_3: attasammāpaṇidhi pubbe ca katapuññatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:618: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:619: Vi – tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave saṅgahavatthūni. Katamāni cattāri, dānaṃ peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyā samānattatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:621: Pu – bhattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:622_0: Vi – tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanusamayaṃ āsayā
anya-e0904n0:622_1: nikkhamati, āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambhati, vijambhitvā samantā catuddisā anuviloketi,
anya-e0904n0:622_2: samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati, tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ
anya-e0904n0:622_3: naditvā gocarāya pakkamatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:624: Pu – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte cakkavagge chaṭṭhaṃ doṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:625_0: Vi – antarā ca bhante ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabyaṃ doṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:625_1: Doṇo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0904n0:625_2: bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa devo bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:626: “Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, na vatimāni manussabhūtassa padāni bhavissanti”.
anya-e0904n0:632: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ ujjayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:633_0: Vi – navamaṃ bhante ujjayasuttaṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi, na
anya-e0904n0:633_1: panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi. Yathārūpe kho brāhmaṇa yaññe gāvo haññanti,
anya-e0904n0:633_2: ajeḷakā haññanti, kukkuṭasūkarā haññanti, vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:637: Pu – rohitassavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:638_0: Vi – rohitassavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā,
anya-e0904n0:638_1: katamā catasso, atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya
anya-e0904n0:638_2: saṃvattati, atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya
anya-e0904n0:638_3: saṃvattati, atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n0:638_4: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattatī”ti
anya-e0904n0:640: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:641_0: Vi – tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave pañhabyākaraṇāni.
anya-e0904n0:641_1: Katamāni cattāri, atthi bhikkhave pañho ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo, atthi bhikkhave pañho
anya-e0904n0:641_2: vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, atthi bhikkhave pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo, atthi bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:644: Pu – puññābhisandavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:645_0: Vi – puññābhisandavagge bhante tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ antarā ca madhuraṃ antarā ca
anya-e0904n0:645_1: verañjaṃ sambahule gahapatayo ca gahapatāniyo ca ārabbha “cattārome gahapatayo saṃvāsā.
anya-e0904n0:645_2: Katame cattāro, chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati,
anya-e0904n0:645_3: devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:647: Pu – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puññābhisandavagge pañcamaṃ samajīvisuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:648_0: Vi – pañcamaṃ bhante samajīvisuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyyuṃ ce gahapatayo ubho jānipatayo diṭṭhe
anya-e0904n0:648_1: ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passituṃ, abhisamparāyañca aññamaññaṃ passituṃ, ubhova assu
anya-e0904n0:648_2: samasaddhā samasīlā samacāgā samapaññā, te diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passanti,
anya-e0904n0:648_3: abhisamparāyañca aññamaññaṃ passantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:651: Pu – pattakammavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:652_0: Vi – pattakammavagge bhante dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ
anya-e0904n0:652_1: gahapatiṃ ārabbha “cattārimāni gahapati sukhāni adhigamanīyāni gihinā kāmabhoginā
anya-e0904n0:652_2: kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ upādāya. Katamāni cattāri, atthisukhaṃ bhogasukhaṃ
anya-e0904n0:654: Bhuñjaṃ bhogasukhaṃ macco, tato paññā vipassati;
anya-e0904n0:659: Pu – apaṇṇakavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:660_0: Vi – apaṇṇakavagge bhante tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ “catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:660_1: asappuriso veditabbo. Katamehi catūhi, idha bhikkhave asappuriso yo hoti parassa
anya-e0904n0:660_2: avaṇṇo taṃ apuṭṭhopi pātu karoti ko pana vādo puṭṭhassā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:663: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ acinteyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:664_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante acinteyyasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni,
anya-e0904n0:664_1: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa. Katamāni cattāri, buddhānaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:664_2: buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti
anya-e0904n0:667: Pu – macalavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:668_0: Vi – macalavagge bhante pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo
anya-e0904n0:668_1: saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, tamotamaparāyaṇo, tamojotiparāyaṇo, jotitamaparāyaṇo,
anya-e0904n0:671: Pu – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte asuravagge paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:672_0: Vi – asuravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:672_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, asuro asuraparivāro, asuro devaparivāro, devo asuraparivāro,
anya-e0904n0:674: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ samādhisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:675_0: Vi – catutthaṃ bhante samādhisuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:675_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa
anya-e0904n0:675_2: na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya. Idha pana bhikkhave puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya,
anya-e0904n0:675_3: na lābhī ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa. Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo na ceva lābhī
anya-e0904n0:675_4: hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, na ca lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya. Idha pana
anya-e0904n0:675_5: bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāyā”ti
anya-e0904n0:677: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ rāgavinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:678_0: Vi – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante rāgavinayasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:678_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno
anya-e0904n0:678_2: no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya
anya-e0904n0:681: Pu – valāhakavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ valāhakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:682_0: Vi – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “cattārome bhikkhave valāhakā.
anya-e0904n0:682_1: Katame cattāro, gajjitā no vassitā, vassitā no gajjitā, neva gajjitā no vassitā,
anya-e0904n0:682_2: gajjitā ca vassitā ca. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro valāhakā. Evameva kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:682_3: cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjāmānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, gajjitā
anya-e0904n0:682_4: no vassitā, vassitā no gajjitā, neva gajjitā no vassitā, gajjitā ca vassitā cā”ti
anya-e0904n0:684: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ udakarahadasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:685_0: Vi – catuttha bhante udakarahadasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave udakarahadā. Katame cattāro,
anya-e0904n0:685_1: uttāno gambhīrobhāso, gambhīro uttānobhāso, uttāno uttānobhāso, gambhīro gambhīrobhāso,
anya-e0904n0:685_2: ime kho bhikkhave cattāro udakarahadā. Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro udakarahadūpamā
anya-e0904n0:685_3: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, uttāno gambhīrobhāso, gambhīro
anya-e0904n0:685_4: uttānobhāso, uttāno uttānobhāso, gambhīro gambhīrobhāso”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:687: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mūsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:688_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante mūsikasuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave mūsikā. Katamā catasso,
anya-e0904n0:688_1: gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā, vasitā no gādhaṃ kattā, neva gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā, gādhaṃ
anya-e0904n0:688_2: kattā ca vasitā ca. Imā kho bhikkhave catasso mūsikā. Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro
anya-e0904n0:688_3: mūsikūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā,
anya-e0904n0:688_4: vasitā no gādhaṃ kattā, neva gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā, gādhaṃ kattā ca vasitā cā”ti
anya-e0904n0:690_0: Pu – saṃgītāpi āvuso aṅguttaranikāyato kānici suttāni uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi
anya-e0904n0:690_1: bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā. Saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte valāhakavagge
anya-e0904n0:691_0: Vi – valāhakavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ balībaddhasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave balībaddhā.
anya-e0904n0:691_1: Katame cattāro, sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo, paragavacaṇḍo no sagavacaṇḍo, sagavacaṇḍo
anya-e0904n0:691_2: ca paragavacaṇḍo ca, neva sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro
anya-e0904n0:691_3: balībaddhā. Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro balībaddhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n0:693: Pu – kesivagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ kesisuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:694_0: Vi – kesiṃ bhante assadammasārathiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kesi bhante assadammasārathi
anya-e0904n0:694_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi, kathaṃ pana
anya-e0904n0:694_2: bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vinetī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ahaṃ kho kesi purisadammaṃ
anya-e0904n0:694_3: saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi. Tatridaṃ kesi saṇhasmiṃ
anya-e0904n0:694_4: – iti kāyasucaritaṃ iti kāyasucaritassa vipāko, iti vacīsucaritaṃ iti vacīsucaritassa
anya-e0904n0:694_5: vipāko, iti manosucaritaṃ iti manosucaritassa vipāko, iti devā iti manussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:695: “Tvaṃ khosi kesi paññāto assadammasārathīti, kathaṃ pana tvaṃ kesi assadammasārathi” –
anya-e0904n0:696: “Ahaṃ kho bhante assadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi” –
anya-e0904n0:697: “Sace te kesi assadammo saṇhena vinayaṃ na upeti, pharusena vinayaṃ na upeti, saṇhapharusena vinayaṃ na upeti, kinti naṃ karosi” –
anya-e0904n0:698: “Bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi, kathaṃ pana bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vineti” –
anya-e0904n0:699: Na 0.0087 kho bhante bhagavato pāṇātipāto kappati, atha ca pana bhagavā evamāha “hanāmi naṃ kesī”ti.
anya-e0904n0:701: Pu – bhayavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:702_0: Vi – bhayavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni.
anya-e0904n0:702_1: Katamāni cattāri, attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhaya”nti
anya-e0904n0:704_0: Pu – idāni āvuso bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā saṃgītā aṅguttaranikāyatopi kānici suttāni
anya-e0904n0:704_1: uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi, saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puggalavagge
anya-e0904n0:705_0: Vi – puggalavagge bhante navamaṃ dhammakathikasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave dhammakathikā.
anya-e0904n0:705_1: Katame cattāro, idha bhikkhave ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca, parisā
anya-e0904n0:705_2: cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa. Evarūpo bhikkhave dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya
anya-e0904n0:705_3: dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:707: Pu – indriyavagge pana āvuso sattamaṃ rogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:708_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante rogasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave rogā. Katame dve, kāyiko ca rogo,
anya-e0904n0:708_1: cetasiko ca rogo. Dissanti bhikkhave sattā kāyikena rogena ekampi vassaṃ ārogyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:708_2: paṭijānamānā dvepi vassāni tīṇipi vassāni cattāripi vassāni pañcapi vassāni dasapi
anya-e0904n0:708_3: vassāni vīsampi vassāni tiṃsampi vassāni cattārīsampi vassāni paññāsampi vassāni
anya-e0904n0:708_4: ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā vassasatampi bhiyyopi ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā. Te bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0904n0:708_5: sudullabhā lokasmiṃ, ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijānanti aññatra
anya-e0904n0:711: Pu – paṭipadāvagge āvuso dasamaṃ yuganaddhasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:712_0: Vi – kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “yo hi koci āvuso bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī
anya-e0904n0:712_1: vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti, sabbo so catūhi maggehi etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti
anya-e0904n0:712_2: evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:714: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:715_0: Vi – brāhmaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ “catunnaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ natthi
anya-e0904n0:715_1: koci pāṭibhogo samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmi”nti
anya-e0904n0:717: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:718_0: Vi – rājagahe bhante vassakāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ magadhamahāmattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Vassakāro
anya-e0904n0:718_1: bhante brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī
anya-e0904n0:718_2: evaṃdiṭṭhi yo koci diṭṭhaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me diṭṭha’nti, natthi tato doso. Yo koci
anya-e0904n0:718_3: sutaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me suta’nti, natthi tato doso”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “nāhaṃ
anya-e0904n0:718_4: brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ‘bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi, na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0904n0:718_5: ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi, nāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ sutaṃ ‘bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi, na
anya-e0904n0:718_6: panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ sutaṃ ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:720: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte brāhmaṇavagge catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:721_0: Vi – brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:721_1: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na
anya-e0904n0:721_2: bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “atthi brāhmaṇa
anya-e0904n0:721_3: maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassa. Atthi pana brāhmaṇa maraṇadhammo
anya-e0904n0:721_4: samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:723: Pu – mahāvagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:724_0: Vi – mahāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ “sotānugatānaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:724_1: vacasā paricitānaṃ manasānupekkhitānaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā
anya-e0904n0:725: Ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ.
anya-e0904n0:727: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ bhaddiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:728_0: Vi – vesāliyaṃ bhante bhaddiyaṃ licchavi ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhaddiyo bhante licchavi
anya-e0904n0:728_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0904n0:728_2: yāya aññatitthiyānaṃ sāvake āvaṭṭetī’ti. Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo
anya-e0904n0:728_3: āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti, yāya aññatitthiyānaṃ sāvake āvaṭṭetī’ti…pe… anabbhakkhātukāmā
anya-e0904n0:728_4: hi mayaṃ bhante bhagavanta”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “etha tumhe bhaddiya mā
anya-e0904n0:728_5: anussavena mā paramparāya mā itikirāya mā piṭakasampadānena mā takkahetu mā nayahetu
anya-e0904n0:728_6: mā ākāravitakkena mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā mā bhabbarūpatāya mā samaṇo no garūti.
anya-e0904n0:728_7: Yadā tumhe bhaddiya attanāva jāneyyātha ‘ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā,
anya-e0904n0:728_8: ime dhammā viññū garahitā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’ti.
anya-e0904n0:728_9: Atha tumhe bhaddiya pajaheyyāthā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:729: Pu – imissā ca pana āvuso desanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa kīdiso dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato. Kathañca naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjitvā taṃ vacanaṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0904n0:730_0: Vi – imissā bhante dhammadesanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa sotāpattiphalasaṅkhāto
anya-e0904n0:730_1: dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato. Api nu tāhaṃ bhaddiya evaṃ avacaṃ “ehi me tvaṃ bhaddiya
anya-e0904n0:730_2: sāvako hohi, ahaṃ satthā bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā ca naṃ bhante bhagavā paṭipucchitvā
anya-e0904n0:732: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mallikādevīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:733_0: Vi – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante mallikādeviṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Mallikā bhante devī bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:733_1: etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca
anya-e0904n0:733_2: hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya, daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca…pe…
anya-e0904n0:733_3: ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā
anya-e0904n0:733_4: pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā, aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā
anya-e0904n0:733_5: mahesakkhā cā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “idha mallike mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā”ti
anya-e0904n0:735: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte sappurisavagge catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:736_0: Vi – sappurisavagge bhante catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ “asappurisañca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:736_1: desessāmi asappurisena asappurisatarañca sappurisañca sappurisena sappurisatarañca,
anya-e0904n0:736_2: taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:738: Pu – tattheva āvuso parisāvagge paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:739_0: Vi – parisāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave parisadūsanā.
anya-e0904n0:739_1: Katame cattāro, bhikkhu bhikkhave dussīlo pāpadhammo parisadūsano, bhikkhunī bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:739_2: dussīlā pāpadhammā parisadūsanā, upāsako bhikkhave dussīlo pāpadhammo parisadūsano,
anya-e0904n0:739_3: upāsikā bhikkhave dussīlā pāpadhammā parisadūsanā. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro parisadūsanā”ti
anya-e0904n0:742: Pu – pañcakanipāte pana āvuso paṭhame sekhabalavagge paṭhamaṃ saṃkhittasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:743_0: Vi – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “pañcimāni bhikkhave sekhabalāni.
anya-e0904n0:743_1: Katamāni pañca, saddhābalaṃ hirībalaṃ ottappabalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ paññābalaṃ. Imāni
anya-e0904n0:743_2: kho bhikkhave pañca sekhabalānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:745: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ dukkhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:746_0: Vi – tatiyaṃ bhante dukkhasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu
anya-e0904n0:746_1: diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ kāyassa ca bhedā
anya-e0904n0:746_2: paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā. Katamehi pañcahi, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asaddho
anya-e0904n0:746_3: hoti ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:748: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ samāpattisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:749_0: Vi – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante samāpattisuttaṃ “na tāva bhikkhave akusalassa samāpatti hoti,
anya-e0904n0:749_1: yāva saddhā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu. Yato ca kho bhikkhave saddhā antarahitā
anya-e0904n0:749_2: hoti asaddhiyaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati, atha akusalassa samāpatti hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:751: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ kāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:752_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante kāmasuttaṃ “yebhuyyena bhikkhave sattā kāmesu laḷitā. Asitabyābhaṅgiṃ
anya-e0904n0:752_1: bhikkhave kulaputto ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti, saddhāpabbajito kulaputtoti
anya-e0904n0:754: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye pañcakanipāte pañcaṅgikavagge chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:755_0: Vi – pañcaṅgikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave vimuttāyatanāni,
anya-e0904n0:755_1: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimuccati,
anya-e0904n0:755_2: aparikkhīṇā vā āsavā parikkhayaṃ gacchanti, ananuppattaṃ vā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ
anya-e0904n0:757: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ caṅkamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:758_0: Vi – navamaṃ bhante caṅkamasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave caṅkame ānisaṃsā. Katame pañca,
anya-e0904n0:758_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, appābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ
anya-e0904n0:758_2: sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkamādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. Ime kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:758_3: pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:760: Pu – sumanavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sumanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:761_0: Vi – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sumanaṃ rājakumāriṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sumanā bhante rājakumārī
anya-e0904n0:761_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idhassu bhante bhagavato dve sāvakā samasaddhā samasīlā samapaññā
anya-e0904n0:761_2: eko dāyako eko adāyako. Te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0904n0:761_3: Devabhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ bhante siyā viseso siyā nānākaraṇa”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0904n0:761_4: “yo so sumane dāyako, so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti,
anya-e0904n0:761_5: dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena ādhipateyyena.
anya-e0904n0:761_6: Yo so sumane dāyako, so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti
anya-e0904n0:767: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ uggahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:768_0: Vi – tatiyaṃ bhante uggahasuttaṃ bhaddiye uggahaṃ meṇḍakanattāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:768_1: Uggaho bhante meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “imā me bhante kumāriyo patikulāni
anya-e0904n0:768_2: gamissanti, ovadatu tāsaṃ bhante bhagavā, anusāsatu tāsaṃ bhante bhagavā, yaṃ tāsaṃ
anya-e0904n0:768_3: assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha kumāriyo
anya-e0904n0:768_4: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ” yassa vo mātāpitaro bhattuno dassanti atthakāmā hitesino anukampakā
anya-e0904n0:768_5: anukampaṃ upādāya, tassa bhavissāma pubbuṭṭhāyino pacchānipātiniyo kiṃ kārapaṭissāviniyo
anya-e0904n0:768_6: manāpacāriniyo piyavādiniyo’ti. Evañhi vo kumāriyo sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:770: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte sumanavagge catutthaṃ sīhasenāpatisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:771_0: Vi – vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sīho bhante senāpati bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:771_1: etadavoca “sakkā nu kho bhante sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ paññāpetu”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0904n0:771_2: vatthusmiṃ “sakkā sīha, dāyako sīha dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:773: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ kāladānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:774_0: Vi – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante kāladānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave kāladānāni. Katamāni pañca,
anya-e0904n0:774_1: āgantukassa dānaṃ deti, gamikassa dānaṃ deti, gilānassa dānaṃ deti, dubbhikkhe dānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:774_2: deti, yāni tāni navasassāni navaphalāni, tāni paṭhamaṃ sīlavantesu patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0904n0:774_3: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca kāladānānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:776: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ bhojanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:777_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante bhojanasuttaṃ “bhojanaṃ bhikkhave dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:777_1: pañca ṭhānāni deti. Katamāni pañca, āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ deti, sukhaṃ deti, balaṃ deti,
anya-e0904n0:777_2: paṭibhānaṃ deti. Āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā”ti
anya-e0904n0:779: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ puttasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:780: Vi – navamaṃ bhante puttasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni sampassanto mābhāpitaro puttaṃ icchanti kule jāyamānaṃ. Katamāni pañca,
anya-e0904n0:781: Bhato vā no bharissati, kiccaṃ vā no karissati, kulavaṃso ciraṃ ṭhassati, dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:783: Pu – muṇḍarājavagge panāvuso dasamaṃ nāradasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:784_0: Vi – pāṭaliputte bhante muṇḍaṃ rājānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Muṇḍassa bhante rañño bhaddā
anya-e0904n0:784_1: devī kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā. So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva
anya-e0904n0:784_2: nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati, na kammantaṃ payojeti, rattindivaṃ bhaddāya
anya-e0904n0:784_3: deviyā sarīre ajjhomucchito. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcimāni mahārāja alabbhanīyāni
anya-e0904n0:784_4: ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi”nti
anya-e0904n0:784_5: evamādinā bhante āyasmatā nāradattherena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa bhagavatā desitaniyāmena desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:788: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte nīvaraṇavagge catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:789_0: Vi – nīvaraṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave asamayā padhānāya.
anya-e0904n0:789_1: Katame pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto. Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo
anya-e0904n0:791: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ ṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:792_0: Vi – sattamaṃ bhante ṭhānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbāni
anya-e0904n0:792_1: itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā. Katamāni pañca, jarādhammomhi
anya-e0904n0:792_2: jaraṃ anatītoti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena
anya-e0904n0:794: Pu – yodhājīvavagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:795_0: Vi – yodhājīvavagge bhante tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu bhikkhu dhammaṃ
anya-e0904n0:795_1: pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ dutivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ
anya-e0904n0:795_2: vedallaṃ, so tāya dhammapariyattiyā divasaṃ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, nānuyuñjati
anya-e0904n0:795_3: ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu bhikkhu pariyattibahulo no dhammavihārī”ti
anya-e0904n0:796: Dhammavihārī dhammavihārīti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
anya-e0904n0:798: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:799_0: Vi – yodhājīvavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:799_1: anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ
anya-e0904n0:799_2: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:801: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ tatiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:802_0: Vi – tattheva bhante navamaṃ katiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni
anya-e0904n0:802_1: etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti, tāni vo paṭibujjhitabbāni, paṭibujjhitvā
anya-e0904n0:802_2: ca tesaṃ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṃ. Katamāni pañca, bhavissanti bhikkhave bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:802_3: abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:804: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:805_0: Vi – yodhājīvavagge bhante dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:805_1: anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti, tāni vo paṭibujjhitabbāni,
anya-e0904n0:805_2: paṭibujjhitvā ca tesaṃ pahānāya vāyamitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:808: Pu – kakudhavagge āvuso navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:809_0: Vi – kakudhavagge bhante navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:809_1: āsayā nikkhamati, āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambhati, vijambhitvā samantā catuddisaṃ anuviloketi,
anya-e0904n0:809_2: samantā catuddisaṃ anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:812: Pu – andhakavindavagge pana āvuso “paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:813_0: Vi – andhakavindavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi
anya-e0904n0:813_1: samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo
anya-e0904n0:815: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ andhakavindasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:816_0: Vi – magadhesu bhante andhakavinde āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha “ye te ānanda bhikkhū
anya-e0904n0:816_1: navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, te vo ānanda bhikkhū pañcasu dhammesu
anya-e0904n0:816_2: samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:819: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte gilānavagge dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:820_0: Vi – gilānavagge bhante dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ “yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0904n0:820_1: vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti, pañca dhamme bahulīkaroti, tassa dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:820_2: aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ ‘diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā’.
anya-e0904n0:820_3: Katame pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno ajjhattaññeva satisūpaṭṭhitā hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:822: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:823_0: Vi – tatiyaṃ bhante upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato gilāno
anya-e0904n0:823_1: dūpaṭṭhāko hoti. Katamehi pañcahi, asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, bhesajjaṃ
anya-e0904n0:825: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ anāyussāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:826_0: Vi – pañcamaṃ bhante anāyussāsuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā anāyussā. Katame pañca,
anya-e0904n0:826_1: asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, akālacārī ca
anya-e0904n0:826_2: hoti, abrahmacārī ca. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā anāyussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:828: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ samaṇasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:829_0: Vi – aṭṭhamaṃ bhante samaṇasukhasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave samaṇadukkhāni. Katamāni
anya-e0904n0:829_1: pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, asantuṭṭho hoti
anya-e0904n0:829_2: itarītarena piṇḍapātena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena, asantuṭṭho hoti
anya-e0904n0:829_3: itarītarena gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, anabhirato ca brahmacariyaṃ carati.
anya-e0904n0:829_4: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca samaṇadukkhānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:831: Pu – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ byasanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:832_0: Vi – dasamaṃ bhante byasanasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave byasanāni. Katamāni pañca,
anya-e0904n0:832_1: ñātibyasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ sīlabyasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasana”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:835: Pu – rājavagge pana āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:836_0: Vi – rājavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:836_1: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto oparajjaṃ patthetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:838: Pu – tikaṇḍakīvagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:839_0: Vi – tikaṇḍakīvagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave sappurisadānāni.
anya-e0904n0:839_1: Katamāni pañca, saddhāya dānaṃ deti, sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ deti, kālena dānaṃ deti, anuggahitacitto
anya-e0904n0:839_2: dānaṃ deti, attānañca parañca anupahacca dānaṃ detī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:842: Pu – saddhammavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:843_0: Vi – saddhammavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi
anya-e0904n0:843_1: samannāgato sunakkhopi saddhammaṃ abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:843_2: Katamehi pañcahi, kathaṃ paribhoti, kathikaṃ paribhoti, attānaṃ paribhotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:845: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:846_0: Vi – tattheva bhante catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā
anya-e0904n0:846_1: saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhū
anya-e0904n0:846_2: na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanti, na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0904n0:846_3: dhārenti, na sakkaccaṃ dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti, na sakkaccaṃ atthamaññāya
anya-e0904n0:846_4: dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā saddhammassa
anya-e0904n0:846_5: sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:848: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:849_0: Vi – tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā
anya-e0904n0:849_1: saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhū
anya-e0904n0:849_2: dhammaṃ na pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ
anya-e0904n0:849_3: abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ. Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya
anya-e0904n0:851: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:852_0: Vi – tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā
anya-e0904n0:852_1: saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame pañca, idha bhikkhave bhikkhū
anya-e0904n0:852_2: duggahitaṃ suttantaṃ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittahi padabyañjanehi. Dunnikkhittassa
anya-e0904n0:852_3: bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti. Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa
anya-e0904n0:852_4: sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:854: Pu – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte saddhammavagge sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:855_0: Vi – saddhammavagge bhante sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ “pañcannaṃ bhikkhave puggalānaṃ
anya-e0904n0:855_1: kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya. Katamesaṃ pañcannaṃ, assaddhassa bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:855_2: saddhākathā dukkathā, dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathā, appassutassa bāhusaccakathā
anya-e0904n0:855_3: dukkathā, maccharissa cāgakathā dukkathā, duppaññassa paññākathā dukkathā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:857: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ udāyisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:858_0: Vi – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā
anya-e0904n0:858_1: gīhiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti. Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:858_2: udāyiṃ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ. Disvā yena bhagavā
anya-e0904n0:858_3: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ
anya-e0904n0:858_4: nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya
anya-e0904n0:858_5: parivuto dhammaṃ desetī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ānanda sukaraṃ paresaṃ
anya-e0904n0:858_6: dhammaṃ desetuṃ, paresaṃ ānanda dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0904n0:858_7: paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:861: Pu – āghātavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:862_0: Vi – āghātavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave āghātapaṭivinayā,
anya-e0904n0:862_1: yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo. Katame pañca, yasmiṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n0:862_2: puggale āghāto jāyetha, mettā tasmiṃ puggale bhāvetabbā, evaṃ tasmiṃ puggale āghāto
anya-e0904n0:865: Pu – upāsakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:866_0: Vi – upāsakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:866_1: upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:868: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ pītisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:869_0: Vi – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante pītisuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “tumhe
anya-e0904n0:869_1: kho gahapati bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.
anya-e0904n0:869_2: Na kho gahapati tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā “mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā
anya-e0904n0:869_4: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “kindi mayaṃ kālena kālaṃ pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja vihareyyāmā”ti
anya-e0904n0:871: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:872_0: Vi – tattheva bhante sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ “pañcimā bhikkhave vaṇijjā upāsakena
anya-e0904n0:872_1: akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca, satthavaṇijjā sattavaṇijjā maṃsavaṇijjā majjavaṇijjā visavaṇijjā.
anya-e0904n0:872_2: Imā kho bhikkhave pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:874: Pu – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ gavesīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:875_0: Vi – dasamaṃ bhante gavesīsuttaṃ kosalesu āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
anya-e0904n0:875_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0904n0:875_2: “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya, na akāraṇena tathāgatā
anya-e0904n0:875_3: sitaṃ pātukarontī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bhūtapubbaṃ ānanda imasmiṃ padese
anya-e0904n0:875_4: nagaraṃ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ, taṃ kho panānanda nagaraṃ
anya-e0904n0:875_5: kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:877: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:878_0: Vi – brāhmaṇavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgatā
anya-e0904n0:878_1: vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi,
anya-e0904n0:878_2: kālena bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca
anya-e0904n0:878_3: bhāsitā hoti, mettācittena ca bhāsitā hoti, imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā
anya-e0904n0:878_4: vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūna”nti evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n0:880: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:881_0: Vi – tattheva bhante navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ “yaṃ bhikkhave sīlavanto pabbajitā kulaṃ
anya-e0904n0:881_1: upasaṅkamanti, tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti. Katamehi pañcahi,
anya-e0904n0:881_2: yasmiṃ bhikkhave samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni
anya-e0904n0:881_3: pasādenti, saggasaṃvattanikaṃ bhikkhave taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ
anya-e0904n0:884: Pu – kimilavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:885_0: Vi – kimilavagge bhante dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṃsā dhammassavane.
anya-e0904n0:885_1: Katame pañca, assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ
anya-e0904n0:885_2: karoti, cittamassa pasīdati, ime kho bhikkhave pañca ānisaṃsā dhammassavane”ti evaṃ
anya-e0904n0:888: Pu – akkosakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:889_0: Vi – akkosakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
anya-e0904n0:889_1: Katame pañca, bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, verabahulo ca hoti, vajjabahulo
anya-e0904n0:889_2: ca, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ
anya-e0904n0:891: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:892_0: Vi – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā apāsādike.
anya-e0904n0:892_1: Katame pañca, appasannā nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hoti, satthusāsanaṃ
anya-e0904n0:892_2: akataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa nappasīdati. Ime
anya-e0904n0:892_3: kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā apāsādike”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:895: Pu – āvāsikavagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:896_0: Vi – āvāsikavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:896_1: āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti. Katamehi pañcahi, na ākappasampanno hoti na vattasampanno,
anya-e0904n0:896_2: na bahussuto hoti na sutadharo, na paṭisallekhitā hoti na paṭisallānārāmo, na kalyāṇavāco
anya-e0904n0:896_3: hoti na kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, duppañño hoti jaḷo eḷamūgo. Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi
anya-e0904n0:896_4: dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:898: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:899_0: Vi – tattheva bhante sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n0:899_1: āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi pañcahi, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā
anya-e0904n0:899_2: avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā vaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0904n0:899_3: āvāsamaccharī hoti āvāsapaligedhī, kulamaccharī hoti kulapaligedhi, saddhādeyyaṃ
anya-e0904n0:899_4: vinipāteti. Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ
anya-e0904n0:899_5: nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:902: Pu – duccaritavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:903_0: Vi – duccaritavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā duccarite.
anya-e0904n0:903_1: Katame pañca, attāpi attānaṃ upavadati, anuvicca viññū garahanti, pāpako kittisaddo
anya-e0904n0:903_2: abbhuggacchati, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ
anya-e0904n0:903_3: vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā duccarite”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:905: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n0:906_0: Vi – tattheva bhante navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā sivathikāya.
anya-e0904n0:906_1: Katame pañca, asuci, duggandhā, sappaṭibhayā, vāḷānaṃ amanussānaṃ āvāso, bahuno janassa
anya-e0904n0:906_2: ārodanā. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā sivathikāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
